name: RepDetailsPanel
functionalRequirements:
## Rep Details Panel

### Purpose
Slide-out panel showing detailed sales rep performance metrics using SingleRecordView for basic rep information.

### Features
- Rep name and title header using SingleRecordView for standardized display
- Performance metrics cards with custom formatting
- Deal pipeline breakdown
- Recent activities list
- Performance chart
- Close button

dataRequirements.description: Displays detailed sales rep performance metrics

entities.name: Deals
entities.description: Deals owned by the rep for performance metrics

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- rep: Selected rep object
- isOpen: Panel visibility
- onClose: Close callback

### Layout
- Fixed position slide-out
- Header with rep info
- Metrics grid
- Scrollable content
